main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.time

Class TimeKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.com.djrapitops.plan.data.time.TimeKeeper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GMTimes

    public abstract class TimeKeeper
extends Object
    Abstract class for keeping track of time spent in each state.

        public void setTime(String state,

        Sets a specific time for a state.
        Parameters:
        state - State to set
        time - Time in ms the state has been active for
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If given state is null
